The loop invariant for the i-th iteration of the loop holds true because:

* `arr_value = arr[i]` - The value of `arr[i]` is compared with the target value in each iteration. If they match, then the ID value is updated to `id_value = arr[i]`.
* `q` is incremented after each iteration - This ensures that we check all elements in the array before exiting the loop.
